SourceProxy.name: CGNSReader
SourceProxy.label: CGNS Reader

Documentation.short_help: Read a dataset in CGNS format.
Documentation.long_help: Read files stored in CGNS format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The CGNS reader reads files stored in CGNS format. The default file extension is .cgns. The output of this reader is a multi-block dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a list of the point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a list of the cell-centered arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: LoadMesh
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether zone mesh must be read for selected bases/families.

IntVectorProperty.name: LoadPatches
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether boundary condition patches must be read for selected bases/families.

IntVectorProperty.name: DoublePrecisionMesh
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Double Precision Mesh
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to load mesh with double precision values or with floating values If unchecked, mesh coordinates are store on 32 bit so it has lower memory footprint. If checked, mesh coordinates are store on 64 bit so it has higher memory requirements. Changing this property may impact the loading performance since if the cgns file mesh precision and the wanted precision are different conversion will occur

IntVectorProperty.name: CacheMesh
IntVectorProperty.label: Caching Mesh Points
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to cache mesh points. If unchecked, mesh coordinates are read at every time step. If checked, mesh coordinates are store in the cache. When loading a new iteration, the mesh coordinates will be retrieved from the cache. Changing this property may impact the loading performance.

IntVectorProperty.name: CacheConnectivity
IntVectorProperty.label: Caching Unstructured Mesh Connectivity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to cache mesh connectivity for unstructured meshes. If unchecked, mesh connectivity are read at every time step. If checked, mesh connectivity are store in the cache. When loading a new iteration, the mesh connectivity will be retrieved from the cache. Changing this property may impact the loading performance.

IntVectorProperty.name: CreateEachSolutionAsBlock
IntVectorProperty.label: Each Solution As Block (Debug)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to load each Solution node under a zone separately. This is intended only for debug purpose

IntVectorProperty.name: IgnoreFlowSolutionPointers
IntVectorProperty.label: Ignore FlowSolutionPointers
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When checked, the reader will simply ignore **FlowSolutionPointers** in the CGNS file since they are either incomplete or invalid. To locate unsteady solution, the **UseUnsteadyPattern** option should then be activated.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseUnsteadyPattern
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Unsteady Pattern on FlowSolution_t
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When checked, the reader will use pattern matching to detect FlowSolution_t that are relevant for the current timestep. It rely on **FlowSolution_t** nodes being labelled as **...AtStep[tsindex]** to locate solution nodes for a specific timestep. Note, ***tsindex*** starts with 1.

SourceProxy.name: CGNSSeriesReader
SourceProxy.label: CGNS Series Reader

Documentation.short_help: Read a dataset in CGNS format.
Documentation.long_help: Read binary files stored in CGNS format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The CGNS reader reads binary files stored in CGNS format. The default file extension is .cgns. The output of this reader is a multi-block dataset. This reader also supports file series.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. If more than 1 file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide 1 file per time step.

IntVectorProperty.name: IgnoreReaderTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When reading a file-series, if each file in the series does not provide correct time information, the reader will not be able to animate through the file series correctly. Check this to ignore the time information provided by each file.
